P

printAccountStatement(AccountStatementPeriod, Integer) - Static method in class util.CheckPrinter
Prints account statement (all transactions) depending on one of 3 periods in account-statement folder
printMoneyStatement(Integer, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime) - Static method in class util.CheckPrinter
Prints money statement (income and outgo) depending on from-date to to-date in statement-money folder
printReceipt(Transaction) - Static method in class util.CheckPrinter
Prints receipt depending on transaction in check folder

Handles request and prints money statement in statement-money folder.

R

refill(Double, Integer) - Method in class dao.BankDao
performs transfer operation between sender account and receiver account
REFILL - Enum constant in enum class entity.TransactionType
 
run() - Method in class thread.MoneyAccrualThread
Runs the MoneyAccrualThread which will regularly, according to a schedule (once every half a minute), check whether it is necessary to charge percentage (1% - the value is substituted from the configuration file config.yaml) on the remainder bills at the end of the month
